mapper.insert: insert into MC_CONSUME_LOG (PK_ID, USER_NAME, SERVICE_NAME, REQUEST_CONTENT, REQUEST_START_TIME, REQUEST_END_TIME, RUN_START_TIME, RUN_END_TIME, RESPONSE_CONTENT, STATUS, APP_TYPE, REQUEST_TYPE, APP_NAME, ERROR_CODE, MESSAGE, SYNC_TYPE, IS_CACHE, CONSUME_TIME) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responseContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{syncType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCache,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{consumeTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update MC_CONSUME_LOG set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_CONTENT = #{requestContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_START_TIME = #{requestStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_END_TIME = #{requestEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_START_TIME = #{runStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_END_TIME = #{runEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESPONSE_CONTENT = #{responseContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, APP_TYPE = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_TYPE = #{requestType,jdbcType=CHAR}, APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERROR_CODE = #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNC_TYPE = #{syncType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CACHE = #{isCache,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONSUME_TIME = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, USER_NAME, SERVICE_NAME, REQUEST_CONTENT, REQUEST_START_TIME, REQUEST_END_TIME, RUN_START_TIME, RUN_END_TIME, RESPONSE_CONTENT, STATUS, APP_TYPE, REQUEST_TYPE, APP_NAME, ERROR_CODE, MESSAGE, SYNC_TYPE, IS_CACHE, CONSUME_TIME from MC_CONSUME_LOG where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PK_ID, USER_NAME, SERVICE_NAME, REQUEST_CONTENT, REQUEST_START_TIME, REQUEST_END_TIME, RUN_START_TIME, RUN_END_TIME, RESPONSE_CONTENT, STATUS, APP_TYPE, REQUEST_TYPE, APP_NAME, ERROR_CODE, MESSAGE, SYNC_TYPE, IS_CACHE, CONSUME_TIME from MC_CONSUME_LOG
